summarizingTipsTxt1.message: Grade summarizing is in progress - Do not close the window before it's done!

summarizingTipsTxt2.message: Deleting course grading rules will also delete the summarized grades based on the course grading rules. Please proceed with caution. If you really want to delete, enter the verification code below.

summarizingTipsTxt3.message: An error occurred during the grade summarizing!

summarizingTipsTxt4.message: Server error - The grade summarizing failed!

serviceErrorTxt.message: Server error - Please try again later!

inputTxtTips.message: Usernames can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and Chinese characters.

notFoundTxt.message: No courses found - Please re-enter or select!

inputTxtTips2.message: The Grading Rules name must be less than 200 characters!

inputTxtTips4.message: The Grading Rules name already exists!

inputTxtTips8.message: A due date must be set!

inputTxtTips9.message: Must select a class or classes!

tipsTxt1.message: It passed the due date already. Editing is not allowed any more.

tipsTxt2.message: Note: If you still want to edit, re-set the grading due date.

alerttips.message: It passed the due date and the grades are already summarized. You cannot re-summarize the course grades.

examTipTxt.message: It currently does not support exam-type courses!

resourceTxt.message: It currently does not support resource-type courses!

selectRelevantCourseTxt.message: First, select the course to associate with!

noDataTxt.message: No data found - Please try again!

loadDataTxt.message: Failed to load data - please check the network!

selectNodeTxt.message: This course has no structure and can not choose nodes

averageScoreTxt.message: Graded by the avg score of the selected modules

selectCourseAndRulesTxt.message: Select course modules and grading rule

inputTipsTxt1.message: Enter a learning time for a score of total possible

inputTipsTxt2.message: Enter a cut-off learning time for a score of 0

averageScoreAssiTxt.message: Graded by the avg score of the selected assignments

examTipsTxt.message: If multiple attempts allowed for an exam, the highest score is counted

confirmDeleteTxt.message: Are you sure you want to delete this grade item?

scoreTipsTxt1.message: The total weight of the selected grading items is already 100%. If you want to add more grading items, edit the weights first to make the total smaller than 100%.

tableTipsTxt.message: There are still missing entries in the form

scoreTipsTxt2.message: The sum of weights should be 100%. Edit the weights and then click the Finish button to create.

scoreTipsTxt3.message: The sum of weights is more than 100%. Edit the weights and then save.

confirmCancelTxt.message: The updates you made on this page won't be saved after the cancellation. Are you sure you want to cancel?

assessRequired1.message: The cumulative learning progress of the selected modules reaches {inputMax}% for total possible; less than {inputMin}% for 0 point

assessRequired2.message: For the the selected modules, the cumulative learning progress per module reaches {inputMax}% for total possible; less than {inputMin}% for 0 point

assessRequired3.message: The cumulative learning time of the selected modules reaches {inputMax} minutes for total possible; less than {inputMin} minutes for 0 point

assessRequired4.message: For the selected modules, the cumulative learning time per module reaches {inputMax} minutes for total possible; less than {inputMin} minutes for 0 point

assessRequired5.message: For the selected topics, the cumulative learning time per topic reaches {inputMax} minutes for total possible; less than {inputMin} minutes for 0 point

assessExplanation1.message: The content of this courseware differs between the PC version and the ULearning App version. If students have accessed the content on both PC and ULearning App, the learning time will be calculated based on the total sum of both.

assessExplanation2.message: The courseware score is calculated separately for PC and ULearning App. The higher score of each module/topic is counted toward the course final grade. Also the score for the PC-only content  (the content is not available for ULearning App) is counted toward the final grade

assessExplanation3.message: (The red color indicates that this section appears only in the PC version)

selectRule.message: Select course modules and grading rule

operationSetps2.message: Download the template and organize the data in the formats specified in the the template

operationSetps5.message: Note: If you want to update the course grades for students, you can update the file and then re-upload it.

operationSetps6.message: After re-uploading, student grades will be replaced by new grades
